thread.title: Trump welcomes American held in Venezuela

title: Trump welcomes American held in Venezuela
text:
Trump welcomes American held in Venezuela 7:10pm IST - 01:38
American missionary Josh Holt, held by Venezuela without trial on weapons charges since 2016, returned home with his wife on Saturday after the South American country's socialist government unexpectedly released them. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
